actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the excise tax on firearms small manufacturers and producers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the manufacturer's excise tax on firearms any firearm sold by a manufacturer which produces and sells no more than 50 firearms during the calendar year, excluding military sales.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the excise tax on firearms small manufacturers and producers.
